overview: A Congressman is trying to close a sex club against the Satanic wishes of the devil. He entices sexy Danielle, who plays a vampire, to set up the Congressman in an effort to keep the club open. All this nightmarish eroticism is played against a futuristic panorama out of Frank Marino's wild, wicked imagination. Join the cosmic knockout Danielle Cheeks, with cute little Micky Lynn and the sultry Cyborg Isis Nile, and prepare to be Future Shocked! Editors Note: This classic film experiences a black out between 52:42 and 54:03; but the action picks up right where it left off so you don't miss a thing.
title: Sex Punk 2000
